alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 3:50AM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with locally higher amounts possible. Winds will gust as high as 45 mph at times. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
